categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Andru's son was a male Human Sith, who was a son and apprentice of Darth Andru, just like his sister. The siblings eventually conspired against their master and poisoned him.
Darth Andru's son is mentioned briefly in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Dromund Kaas.
